hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا حسين بن الأسود، حدثنا عبيد الله، أخبرنا إسرائيل، عن سماك، بإسناده ومعناه والأول أتم لم يذكر ‏"‏ بسعر يومها ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Simak (b. Harb) with a different chain of narrators and to the same effect. The first version is more perfect. It does not mention the words "at the current rate".
